    Generate a table in the cdm containing drug exposure events with the specified ingredients

    generateIngredientSet.Rd

    Generate a table in the cdm containing drug exposure events with the specified ingredients

    generateIngredientSet(
  cdm,
  name = "adherenceFromOMOP",
  ingredients,
  cohortSchema = NULL,
  cohortId = NULL
)

    Arguments

    cdm

    A cdm_reference object

    name

    Name of the new cohort table, it must be a length 1 character vector.

    ingredients

    Specifies medication under observation. Uses RxNorm Ingredient concept code as acceptable parameter.

    cohortSchema

    Possible include only certain people that exist in a specific defined cohort between a time period. Parameter cohort schema must be a string value of the database schema with the defined cohort.

    cohortId

    Numeric value of the defined cohort that has included person ids as well as start and end date of the cohort.

    Value

    The function returns the cdm reference with a new table

    Contents

    Developed by Johannes Holm, Greete Kelli Aava.
